_sText:
Crossfire - Destroy the Evidence

The sinister worldwide terrorist organisation Black Opps Nihilist Group (or BONG for short) believed to be responsible for such atrocities as the "Pudding Cake Masacre" and the "Night Of The Sly Mongeese" are known to have a weapons and monetary cache somewhere in the industrial complex.

The terrorists have to avoid arrest, prosecution and a probable one way ticket to Guantanamurder Bay Detention Camp by destroying the weapons cache, or they can a cause a complex-wide power shutdown by blowing up the master control room to cover their escape.

The CT's -obviously- have to smite them mightily to stop them 

Map by [KM] G-Rox

With the invaluable help of [KM] Era & [KM] Hubby - without whom this map would not have been possible

---- www.clan-km.com ----
